participant_1.name: Jasper
participant_1.personality: Creative and sociable, Jasper loves connecting with others through music and enjoys his dual role as a musician and barista.
participant_1.background: I'm single and like to spend my free time listening to jazz. I have a student id and hate paying my bills. I have a dog that has behavioral issues. My mother is a dentist. I won a bowling tournament last year, and my CD collection is still safe.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and imaginative, Lily dreams of becoming an actress and expresses her creativity through her love for vintage decor and colorful hair.
participant_2.background: I want to decorate my home with vintage furniture. I am a person who loves the cold weather and enjoys living in rural Wisconsin. I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments. I think my brother's job is really cool. I go to high school.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Pretty good, how about yourself?
Not bad. I just got home from work and am relaxing now.
What kind of work do you do?
I am a musician, and I also work as a barista.
Oh wow, that sounds like a lot of fun!
It is, I love it!
I am just in high school, but I want to be an actor when I grow up.
That's awesome! Acting is a really fun profession.
Thanks! I think so too.
Do you have any favorite actors or actresses?
I love Meryl Streep, she is amazing.
She is a great actress! I also love Leonardo DiCaprio.
He is really good too!
What are some of your favorite movies?
I love The Devil Wears Prada, and The Princess Bride.
Those are both great movies! I love The Princess Bride too.
I also love The Breakfast Club.
That is another great movie!
What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Beatles, Bob Dylan, and The Rolling Stones.
Those are all great bands! I love The Beatles too.
What is your favorite type of music?
I like a lot of different types of music, but I mostly listen to classic rock.
I love classic rock too!
It is the best!
It sure is!
